value.title: Derry: Singer Roisin Quinn, who had stroke at 14, finds her voice again
value.excerpt: Now, four years on, Roisin has truly found her voice again. She is studying performing arts at Derry's North West Regional College and is choreographing a dance to reflect her journey.
